replies.body: Everyone knows there is an issue with the number generator for death recap, no need to go attention seeking
Problem is that its not fixed, and its been this way for a long long time.
And the problem is also that they have said that they fixed it (and did somewhat)

While 'somewhat' may be ok for riot, being hit by one of the most powerful ultimates in the game (which does way over 1000 most games) and has no CC in it whatsoever, and then telling me that it does no damage and is purely a CC status effect.. 
doesn't quite cut the mustard for me. :(

Oh yeah it needs to be properly fixed, it's a matter of the game being on a poor foundation for coding, very little is coded "properly" hence why so many bugs come up seeming out of no where, or even as a result of things (minions being fucked in the past few patches shows how terrible pathing has always been.)
Weren't Rito going to change the coding they are on from this 6 year old code to something newer and better?

they were supposed to be, but it would probably require a lot of effort, which undergoes changes with each additional mechanic they make (for example pathing coding would have to change for Azir wall)
Is there ever a day where you wake up smart? Get a new pillow or something?

Dude
Salt is not going to help this guy,so just nick off if you cant make a positive comment
I can make positive comments. This guy has trolled the boards since the beginning of time. He's brilliant at it.
Me, troll? Pls I'm an angel

In my knowledge,I think it is because like zed ult,if the enemy champ dies before zed could do damage while still untargetable,he will do 1 dmg so he gets an assist.
If Im wrong,plz correct me!
If that was the case it would stop recall (because taking damage), but Karthus's ult doesn't so i assume it doesn't.

Then I don't know
If you want people to accept your ideas them maybe there is a way to reproduce it
That would be better
usually i try do that, especially with champion bugs, but i don't know how to reproduce this.

Then maybe it can't be fixed by riot team
Oh well
